content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to journal on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct}, between #{time_range}.

Each time, I will write honestly about my thoughts, feelings, or what happened during the day.

To prove my commitment, I will submit my journal entries on the days Iâ€™ve committed.

If I miss a day, I accept the consequences set in this quest.

This is my promise to myself â€” to reflect, to grow, and to understand my journey better. âœï¸ğŸ§

basicQuest.title: Daily Journal
basicQuest.instructions:
## ğŸ§  Journal Entry Ideas

* Whatâ€™s been on my mind a lot lately?
* What am I avoiding and why?
* What do I *actually* want right now?
* How do I feel today â€” and what might be causing it?
* Whatâ€™s something Iâ€™m proud of, even if itâ€™s small?
* Where did I waste my energy today?
* What habits are helping me? Which ones are hurting?
* Whatâ€™s one thing I *know* I should do but keep putting off?
* If today repeats forever, what kind of life will I end up with?
* What would my ideal day look like â€” realistically?
* What thoughts have been holding me back?
* What do I want my future self to thank me for?
* What did I learn today â€” about myself or the world?
* Who or what made me feel something strong today?
* What am I grateful for â€” no matter how small?
* What would I say to myself if I were my best friend?
* Whatâ€™s something I need to let go of?
* Whatâ€™s something I need to chase harder?
* What am I pretending not to know?
* What does success mean to *me* â€” not what others say?
